Price Alerts

Here you can set PRICE ALERTS for individual scrips for effective trading. You can set unlimited Alerts. The section is divided into PENDING and MATCHED.

There are multiple ways to set PRICE ALERTS. Search Stock, visit company page and tap on Set Alert and enter the conditions to set price alerts.

For the Dedicated section, MENU -> MY Alerts.

Conditions

  1. Price Alert - Price
    1. Price Attribute - Select some trigger like Last Traded Price from the options
    2. Condition - Select Price Trigger condition
    3. Price - (By default Choice FinX will show a price) Manually enter the price you’d like the alert be triggered at
    4. Date - (Choice FinX will show a forward date) Manually Enter the date on which you’d like to be notified
    5. You can set Alert for BSE as well. Tap Yes or No

Note:- The Alert will show in Notifications

Matched

All triggered alerts will show up here.
